scripts.complete-sync: pnpm generate-sdk && pnpm --filter @bluvo/sdk-ts build && pnpm --filter @bluvo/react build
scripts.sync-sdk-from-openapi-inc-version: jq '.version |= (split(".")|map(tonumber)|.[2] |= .+1|map(tostring)|join("."))' packages/ts/package.json > packages/ts/package.json.tmp && mv packages/ts/package.json.tmp packages/ts/package.json
